stories.fantasy_headline: Sky-Wizards Discover Secret Companion of Giant Star Betelgeuse!
stories.fantasy_story: For many years, the great star Betelgeuse baffled the Sky-Wizards with its strange shimmering. Now, their powerful scrying artifacts have revealed a hidden secret! A smaller celestial body orbits Betelgeuse, creating ripples in its vast, fiery aura. This discovery explains the giant's peculiar dance in the night sky.

stories.original_headline: Astronomers find a ghost galaxy made of dark matter
stories.original_summary: Hubble has revealed a strange cosmic object called Cloud-9, a dark matter–dominated cloud with no stars at all. stories.fantasy_headline: Celestial Scholars Uncover Ghostly Realm of Unseen Shadow Essence!
stories.fantasy_story: Using their ancient scrying glass, the Celestial Scholars have found a peculiar, starless domain called Cloud-9. This 'failed realm' is filled only with unseen shadow essence, a leftover from the dawn of time that never quite sparked to life. It confirms old tales of unlit celestial building blocks.

stories.fantasy_headline: Merchant Guilds Offer Great Bargains on Health Charms and Scrying Disks!

Many are seeking enchanted personal amulets to track their vitality and strength. Also, rare viewing crystals for enjoying ancient tales are on sale, making them perfect for any discerning noble or commoner.

stories.fantasy_headline: Keychron Artisans Unveil Wondrous New Control Orb at Grand Fair!
stories.fantasy_story: At the recent Grand Artisan Fair, the esteemed Keychron Artisan Guild presented many marvels, including new glyph-boards with enduring magical charges. Yet, the star of their display was the 'Nape Pro,' a wondrous control orb. This versatile magical sphere promises to aid scribes and mages alike in navigating their enchanted slates with ease.
